Please choose ONE location. New Covenant Church , 6080 Bethel Island Rd, Bethel Island , 1st & 3rd Sunday 1:00-2:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Delta Food Pantry- Bethel Island (Drive-Thru), 6080 Bethel Island Rd, Bethel Island , Tuesday 10:30-11:15am. Phone: 925-634-6625 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Family Worship Center , 1200 Taylor Rd, Bethel Island , Tuesday 11:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 925-250-7941 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. New Covenant Church , 6080 Bethel Island Rd, Bethel Island , Thursday 4:00-5:30pm
